comments:
I just upgraded from 3.1M3 to 3.1M4, and now, I can't update .classpath files
from the repository.  I have several projects where other developers have
committed changes to the .classpath file.  But I can't do an update because it
seems eclipse thinks it can't write the file.  I went into a DOS prompt, and
deleted the file, then did an update, and the file updated.


I get this in my "cvs" console:

***
cvs update -l -d -P "/jrcore/.classpath"
    U .classpath
failed due to an internal error (took 0:00.328)
   Error: Problem writing resource '/jrcore/.classpath'. Could not write file:
c:\projects\workspace\jrcore\.classpath.
      Error: Could not write file: c:\projects\workspace\jrcore\.classpath.
***
